comments: For n >= 1, a(n) = order of Fibonacci group F(n+1,n).
references: D. L. Johnson, Presentation of Groups, Cambridge, 1976, p. 182.
Thomas, Richard M., The Fibonacci groups revisited, in Groups - St. Andrews 1989, Vol. 2, 445-454, London Math. Soc. Lecture Note Ser., 160, Cambridge Univ. Press, Cambridge, 1991.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: Revised by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 30 2011.
